== "v0.11.0"
=== "2024-08-22 14:23:44 +0000 UTC"

// Disclaimer: this file is generated, do not edit it manually.


__ (github-actions[bot]) released this 2024-08-22 14:23:44 +0000 UTC - v0.11.0__


=== Description

---

++++

<h3>üöÄ  This release brings two new providers to the list of certified providers: CAPV (vSphere) from experimental to GA and CAPZ (Azure). Moreover, our test suite is now available for prospective end-users to use and add their providers to the list of certified providers. For more information please read <a href="https://turtles.docs.rancher.com/tasks/provider-certification/intro" rel="nofollow">here</a>.</h3>
<p>Rancher Turtles is an extension to Rancher that brings full Cluster API integration to Rancher.</p>

<h2>What's Changed</h2>
